eocms_offence_notice_owner_driver.description: Stores core offender information related to a notice, excluding all address-related fields. Each record represents either the owner, hirer or driver associated with a specific offence notice.

columns.name: notice_no
columns.description: The unique identifier for the offence notice.

columns.name: owner_driver_indicator
columns.description: Indicator whether the record relates to an owner or driver.

columns.name: id_no
columns.description: Id number of the owner/driver ( NRIC, FIN, UEN)

columns.name: offender_indicator
columns.description: Indicator to identify if the person is an offender.

columns.name: name
columns.description: The full name of the owner or driver.

columns.name: id_type
columns.description: specific owner identification type.

columns.name: cre_date
columns.description: Creation date of the record

columns.name: cre_user_id
columns.description: ID of user who created the record

columns.name: upd_date
columns.description: Last updated date

columns.name: upd_user_id
columns.description: ID of user who last updated the record

eocms_furnish_application.description: Store furnish data after doing furnish notice

columns.name: txn_no
columns.description: Unique submission reference number for furnished record. (PK)

columns.name: notice_no
columns.description: Notice number

columns.name: vehicle_no
columns.description: Vehicle number

columns.name: offence_date
columns.description: Date of offence

columns.name: pp_code
columns.description: Car Park code

columns.name: pp_name
columns.description: Car Park name

columns.name: last_processing_stage
columns.description: Notice's current processing stage

columns.name: furnish_name
columns.description: Name of the furnished hirer or driver

columns.name: furnish_id_type
columns.description: ID type of furnished hirer or driver

columns.name: furnish_id_no
columns.description: ID number of furnished hirer or driver

columns.name: furnish_mail_blk_no
columns.description: Block/house number of furnished hirer or driver

columns.name: furnish_mail_floor
columns.description: Floor number of furnished hirer or driver

columns.name: furnish_mail_street_name
columns.description: Street name of furnished hirer or driver

columns.name: furnish_mail_unit_no
columns.description: Unit number of furnished hirer or driver

columns.name: furnish_mail_bldg_name
columns.description: Building name of furnished hirer or driver

columns.name: furnish_mail_postal_code
columns.description: Postal code of furnished hirer or driver

columns.name: furnish_tel_code
columns.description: Country code of the furnished hirer/driver's mobile phone

columns.name: furnish_tel_no
columns.description: Contact number of furnished hirer or driver

columns.name: furnish_email_addr
columns.description: Email address of furnished hirer or driver

columns.name: owner_driver_indicator
columns.description: Indicates whether furnished person is a hirer or driver

columns.name: hirer_owner_relationship
columns.description: Relationship between the hirer and owner

columns.name: others_relationship_desc
columns.description: Description of relationships between other parties. Input required if Motorist selected 'Others' under the Relationship with Owner section.

columns.name: ques_one_ans
columns.description: Answer to the first questionnaire question

columns.name: ques_two_ans
columns.description: Answer to the second questionnaire question

columns.name: ques_three_ans
columns.description: Answer to the third questionnaire question

columns.name: rental_period_to
columns.description: End date and time of the vehicle rental period. Input required if Motorist selected 'Vehicle is Leased' under Relationship with Owner section.

columns.name: rental_period_from
columns.description: Start date and time of the vehicle rental period. Input required if Motorist selected 'Vehicle is Leased' under Relationship with Owner section.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Status of the furnish application. Possible values: Pending - Pending officer review, Approved, Rejected, Resubmission â€“ A new submission for an existing furnish application which can be pending, approved or rejected.

columns.name: owner_name
columns.description: Name of person or company that made this submission (Submitter)

columns.name: owner_id_no
columns.description: ID number of the Furnisher

columns.name: owner_tel_code
columns.description: Country code of the Submitter's contact number

columns.name: owner_tel_no
columns.description: Submitter's contact number

columns.name: owner_email_addr
columns.description: Submitter's email address

columns.name: corppass_staff_name
columns.description: Name of the business representative who made the furnish submission on behalf of the company

columns.name: reason_for_review
columns.description: Reason the submission cannot be auto approved

columns.name: is_sync
columns.description: Indicator for sync internet to intranet

columns.name: remarks
columns.description: Remarks relating to the review and approval/rejection of the record. System values: Auto Approved by SYSTEM, Notice is permanently suspended, Furnished ID already current offender, Furnished ID already in Hirer or Driver Details, Hirer/Driver's particulars already present (any ID), Owner/Hirer (submitter) no longer current offender. Users can input remarks manually via the Staff Portal.

columns.name: cre_date
columns.description: Date and time when the record was created. This is also used to represent the date and time of the furnished particulars submission.

columns.name: cre_user_id
columns.description: The user ID who created the record

columns.name: upd_date
columns.description: Date and time when the record was updated

columns.name: upd_user_id
columns.description: The user ID who updated the record

columns.name: txn_no
columns.description: Unique transaction number for the furnish application.

columns.name: notice_no
columns.description: The offence notice number linked to the attachment.

columns.name: attachment_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the attachment.

columns.name: file_name
columns.description: Name of supporting document

columns.name: mime
columns.description: MIME type of the file (e.g., image/png, application/pdf).

columns.name: size
columns.description: File size in bytes.

columns.name: cre_date
columns.description: Date when the record was created.

columns.name: cre_user_id
columns.description: ID of the user who created the record.

columns.name: upd_date
columns.description: Date when the record was last updated.

columns.name: upd_user_id
columns.description: ID of the user who last updated the record.
